content: Allows for nested pseudo instances such as `::UIStroke::UIGradient`.
Adds new Thumbstick Directional Keycodes to be used for direction separation in the Input Action System.
Adds support for emissive maps in `Class.SurfaceAppearance`, `Class.MaterialVariant`, and `Class.TerrainDetail`.
Adds an `Class.Instance.QueryDescendants` method which allows descendant lookup using a query selector string, similar to selectors in UI styling.
Adds several capabilities to the `SecurityCapabilities` enum. These new values only describe engine API access control; they aren't available to use for Sandboxed instances.
Introduces `Class.EncodingService` with functions to perform Base64 encode/decode, computation of Blake/Md5/Sha family hashes and zstd compression.
Adds a guard to prevent script analysis from causing Roblox Studio to crash.
Luau's New Type Solver: Improves non-strict type checking performance for large function calls and function definitions.
Luau's New Type Solver: Improves inference speed for some math heavy code.
PS4: Updates the Strength in Numbers trophy text to "You followed a Roblox connection into a Roblox experience!".
Fixes a bug where shadows did not respect the texture offsets on transparent materials.

To mitigate network traffic, only updates that differ from the existing direction by a nontrivial amount are enacted for experiences where `Class.ControllerManager.FacingDirection|FacingDirection`, `Class.ControllerManager.MovingDirection|MovingDirection`, and `Class.ControllerManager.UpDirection|UpDirection` are updated very frequently.
Reduces the frame time spent updating `Class.AudioEmitter|AudioEmitters` and `Class.AudioListener|AudioListeners` when the "Acoustic Simulation" beta feature is enabled.
Fixes an issue where saved audio device selections were not restoring properly.
Fixes `Class.CompressorSoundEffect` issue that could cause it to produce invalid audio data
Fixes a rare crash in `Class.AudioPlayer` when updating them in parallel.
Adds support for `Class.TextChannel.ShouldDeliverCallback|ShouldDeliverCallback` on the client, allowing client side scripts to control message delivery.
Fixes `Class.Player.Chatted` to fire when using chat commands.
Attempting to set breakpoints on a old script versions no longer leads to a crash.
